questioning_framework.overview: This framework provides structured questions to help uncover project requirements, goals, and constraints during the project setup phase.

category.name: project_foundation
category.description: Questions to understand the core project purpose and vision

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of this project? What problem does it solve?
Who are your target users? What are their main needs and pain points?
What makes this project unique compared to existing solutions?
What are the key success metrics for this project?

category.name: technical_scope
category.description: Questions to understand technical requirements and constraints

questions.question: Do you have existing code, databases, or assets we should work with?
Are there specific technologies, frameworks, or tools you want to use or avoid?
Do you have any existing integrations or dependencies to consider?
What are your performance, scalability, or security requirements?

category.name: feature_prioritization
category.description: Questions to understand what features are most important

questions.question: What are the essential features that must be included in the first version?
What features would be nice to have but aren't critical for launch?
Are there any features you want to avoid or exclude?
How do you envision the user journey from start to finish?

category.name: project_logistics
category.description: Questions to understand timeline, resources, and constraints

questions.question: What is your target timeline for launching this project?
Do you have any external deadlines or dependencies to consider?
What resources (budget, team, tools) do you have available?
Are there any regulatory, compliance, or legal requirements?

category.name: ai_context
category.description: Questions to understand how to best set up AI assistance

questions.question: What kinds of tasks will you want AI help with most often?
Are there specific technical areas where you'll need specialized assistance?
How do you prefer to communicate complex requirements to AI?
What existing documentation or context should AI be aware of?

questioning_approach.description: Begin with high-level questions about project vision, then progressively get more specific about implementation details.
questioning_approach.principle: Ask follow-up questions based on answers
questioning_approach.description: Use the user's responses to guide deeper questions rather than asking all questions in sequence.
Summarize what you've learned and confirm accuracy before moving to the next area.
Take detailed notes of all responses to create comprehensive project context.
